title: Client Won't open
body:
Hi Guys, Just wondering if anyone else is have problems with league? 
i was doing the patch update for 6.4 and it came up with an error and wouldn't update anymore. So i tried to repair my client and that took a few hours and came up with another error. So i reinstalled League and now the banner comes up then goes away and nothing happens.....any ideas?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please run the [Hextech Toolkit](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/HTK_Setup.msi) (As Administrator) for me wth the following settings.

http://puu.sh/nm3o5/4394733781.jpg

Once done could you please email the generated logs (Located on your desktop) to **oce-wrenchmen@googlegroups.com**, please include a link to your thread in the email, thanks.
